thread.title: Comment on Morgan Schneiderlin’s first Man United goal (video) by Isb
thread.title_full: Comment on Morgan Schneiderlin’s first Man United goal (video) by Isb

author: Isb
title: Comment on Morgan Schneiderlin’s first Man United goal (video) by Isb
text:
Tweet 
During the summer, Manchester United did a lot of good transfer business. One of the best, and maybe more underrated deals was the acquisition of Morgan Schneiderlin from Southampton. Schneiderlin’s addition boosts a midfield that sometimes needs depth, as Bastian Schweinsteiger and Michael Carrick have recently had a tendency to suffer a knock or too, and miss time. 
Scoring is not Schneiderlin’s primary function, but when he does provide a goal, it certainly is an added boost. It’s like finding money you didn’t know you had in the pockets of your pants. 
Schneiderlin scored in his very first appearance in a United shirt this preseason (here’s footage of that). Today, however, brought his first goal in meaningful game action, as United crushed Everton 3-0. Schneiderlin provided the first scoring strike in the 18′ here’s the footage: Manchester United's first goal vs Everton Schneiderlin's 1st goal for Manchester United pic.twitter.com/KXi7z9GLaN 
— Semper Fi United (@SemperFiUnited) October 17, 2015 Here’s what Morgan Schneiderlin Tweeted from his official account to recognize the occasion: Great win & great performance from the team ! Buzzing after my 1st goal for @ManUtd #1stcompetitivegoal ? pic.twitter.com/Kg4QSiUlia Paul M. Banks owns, operates and sometimes writes The Sports Bank.net , which is partnered with FOX Sports Engage Network. The website is also featured on News Now. Banks, a former writer for the Washington Times, currently contributes to the Chicago Tribune RedEye. He also appears regularly on numerous talk shows all across the country. Catch him Tuesdays on KOZN 1620 The Zone.
